entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries later this evening. Light snow beginning near midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
